content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from a city meeting in the fall/winter and noticed an object above a neighboring house (one street up from mine). i wondered what a helicopter was doing this time of night over a neighborhood, so i turned off the radio, rolled down the window and drove slowly past the object - it was a dark triangle with milky-white lights on each tip and made no noise. the object was a little smaller than the roof of the house it was hovering above. i kept my eyes fixed on the object and drove slowly past it and into my driveway. the location is approximately 7 miles to the st. louis airport and 1/2 mile off of interstate 70. 
later, on a trip in germany, a student was talking in the bus and described the exact thing i had seen in my neighborhood only over route 3 between waterloo/columbia, illinois on his way to work.
content.summary: Triangle over ranch home approximate size of house

content.detailedDescription: We were lying on chaises in backyard facing to the south about 9:45pm when i noticed a bright white light traveling from the northwest to the southeast.  the light crossed directly over us at an altitude of perhaps 2000 feet and was completely silent.  the light continued traveling to the se and disappeared at a position of perhaps  10 or 11 o"clock relative to our position.  the object's size would have been approximately 1/4 the size of a full moon. about ten minutes later the object reappeared in the sky to the east of us and appeared to make a turn to the south prior to disappearing.  the speed of the object was similar to that of a small plane.  after the second appearance of the object i felt rather uneasy and apprehensive about staying outside and went in the house.  just prior to the reappearance my wife stated "i wish it would come back over."
content.summary: Bright white light traveling nw to se at speed slower than  most planes.  disappeared and then reappeared briefly ten minutes later.

content.detailedDescription: While walking at night from my house to my friend���s nearby apartment, my friend and i witnessed an unidentified flying object. i was looking at the stars, identifying constellations, when i turned to look at the sky in the southeast, over the top of a building i saw a flying object enter my field of vision. the ufo flew seemingly in complete, eerie silence, at a low altitude probably around a few hundred feet and looked to be around slightly less than half the altitude i normally see planes at. it moved at an unusually slow, constant velocity which is difficult to estimate but safe to say that it was definitely the slowest air craft i have ever observed, maybe around the speed of the average bird. the object was dark with three large bright white lights in a triangular configuration on its underside, one toward the front, two in the back. it was somewhat difficult to make out the exact shape due to its angle, the prominence of it���s lights, and the darkness of it's outline contrasting little with the night sky. however it appeared to be flat and triangular, with each white light close to a vertex. the size appeared to be around that of a large helicopter but wider. there was one faint, small flashing light towards the front on the right side of the object (the only side i could see) which seemed to emit multiple, alternating colors of which i remember green, white/yellow, and blue. the object flew over us westward toward the university campus and was visible for around one and a half, possibly two minutes. my friend who was about 30 feet in front of me and who witnessed it for around 30 seconds, saw the same object.
content.summary: Dark triangular craft flys silently and low due west over university campus

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting on our deck with daughter and husband, looking up at the stars.
i saw a strange  dim reddish thing that was traveling at a slow speed , i had no idea what it was i told my daughter(10) to look too, she saw it, (husband never got up to look )we watched this travel n-s, for a few seconds then it did a small zig-zag move then traveled se at same speed, i am having a tough time describing a shape as i couldn't tell if it were triangular or boomerang, the color was very dim like but you could see it was a reddish tone.It appeared to be very high up , but was fairly large. it was not a plane! this lasted only a minute or two then was gone in the distance.
i couldn't keep my eyes off the night sky, i wanted to see it again. i had never seen anything like this before and may not have thought anything(except the color)  if it hadn't flew in a zig zag pattern.
content.summary: Reddish shape in sky traveling (approx) n-s flying a straight line then did a quick zig zag then flew se.

content.detailedDescription: a thunderstorm system had just passed through east volusia county which produced several toradoes. i was interested in the cloud formations which looked very different for our area so i took a picture of the clouds with my cellphone an lg cu400. i did not notice the dark object when i took the photo as the clouds were my focus. this is the original photo off my cellphone. i hope someone can indentify this object as it has me baffled.
content.summary: Unknown object in photo of clouds

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside waiting for my girlfriend to get off work. i like to wait for her outside so that she doesn't have to walk to the house alone in the dark late at night.

tonight i saw a ufo which appeared to be the moon at first glance. 

first it was just a bright spot behind a cloud it seemed. the spot got brighter and appeared to be breaking through the clouds. a disc shape seemed to be travelling into our atmosphere. but over time this changed. it took quite awhile. eventually it became a moon shape, and had a huge crescent shape that was lit up. it was huge, it was like the deathstar from star wars. it was black it seemed, but a crescent shape appeared and quickly seemed to light up brighter and brighter, almost too bright. i thought either a meteor or a nuclear missile was coming to kill us, i really thought it was the end of my life. i walked inside to check the time of the event, shaking, my knees trembling. i went back outside and dared to look again at the horrible object. was it the moon? i kept walking down the sidewalk. but after i got past some street lights i could see it so bright. it had to be the moon.

only when i walked back to the area i was waiting in, the moon had appeared to get much lower in the sky, and was turning bright orange! only the crescent shape seemed to turn orange.

i watched it, and it quickly, within seconds, seemed to be plummeting down to earth. it seemed to be very very far away or in space, and it's lights started turning bright orange, then! another ufo appeared much closer, seemed like it was just behind some trees near me though this huge object was the size of the moon. this new ufo flashed blue lights, about two rows of lights with about 7 blue lights on each row around the center of this second ufo. it went black again immediately, it flashed for literally only a second.

the huge ufo then seemed to continue getting lower and lower in the sky, as if it was a setting sun. but this was late at night and surely the moon cannot set in under a minute from a position high in the sky.

the descent was ridiculously quick and is what made em realize for the first time that this wasn't the moon and was a ufo!

then the lights began to turn off and inbetween the orange light there appeared black spots, like the spots on a cheetah, and i imagine that this is the lights going off. over a few seconds the object continued to plummet behind the horizon and the color faded completely to black.
content.summary: False crescent moon ufo

content.detailedDescription:
we saw bright orange light through window,went outside to get better view,it   was approx 150ft above rooftops.As it travelled towards us it began to climb.
it went over the roof of my house continuing to ascend until it disappeared into the clouds.This was witnessed by my neighbours plus visitors and all my family.
9 people in all.

we thought at first it could have been a hot air balloon,because it had a bright yellow flame in the middle.But it had no basket and it had blue and red lights flashing round it.

thank you

margaret o'neill
content.summary: Bright orange sphere seen by 9 witnesses

content.detailedDescription: My husband and i were outside our house, looking at the stars.  we were admiring the belt of the milky way across the sky.  recently, we have become interested in the universe and all its mysteries.  we were trying to spot anything out of the ordinary. then he shouted "oh!"  i knew exactly what he meant and instantly looked the direction he was pointing.  it took my eyes a couple seconds to focus and then i saw it.  it was moving across the sky.  my first instinct was to try to justify it with something earthly, such as an airplane.  but it was defiantly nothing i've ever seen before.  first, it would go to the left across the sky, then it would go right, back to left.  it made a few circular motions and then started going down.  it wasn't following a straight line in any sense.  the light was changing colors, red, white-ish (like the stars) and orange.  i just kept saying "wow" and felt good about having witnessed that there is something out there, whatever it may be.  we watched as it danced down behind some trees and out of sight.  i kept watching and i saw it briefly as it passed between two tree and then it was gone.
content.summary: Flashing light amongst the stars in the sky, didn't follow a straight line, moving fairly fast.

content.detailedDescription:
07\25\09 12:55 am sitka alaska.

while outside with my wife looking at the constellations i notice one star like object moving at a casual rate very high above the planet its appeared to be swaying slightly back and forth. i turn and say look ufo to my wife then point. she sees it. we stare for about 2 min before it goes beyond the trees line, so there we both have out first ufo sighting.

after thoughts- im am no sceptic could have been a spy plane but no. we saw it so defeats that. satalite? no. it was not exactly on a straight path. no to baloons. shuttle no..Comet or meteo..No. i read universetoday.Com they usualy mention shooting stars and stuff. top secret government project could be it i admit but why can we see it so no.
content.summary: Shimmering object high in atmosphere

content.detailedDescription:
My mother went outside and saw lights in the sky,
and called on to my father, and i eventually came outside to see it
at first there were 4 oval lights in the sky that would circle in the sky and come to one exact point altogether. this went on for around maybe 20 minutes and during that time many other ovals than just the four would also appear but not as vividly as the main four lights. the lights in the sky would repeat this motion consecutivly they would form one main oval light break off and make a circular motion in the sky and then form back into one oval light. at the end of this mysterious event, there had then been two sets of four oval lights forming a single oval meaning four lights circulating in the sky and forming one oval light while another four lights would form one oval which were very close in distance together. at the end of the thirty minutes of this phenomenon it completly vanished just stopped altogether.

my moms thoughts were maybe angels or ufos,
my dads thoughts maybe the northern lights
but then he decided it couldn't be since this phenomenon was going on far too long and there were many lights in the sky he also thought that when they formed one oval there could be a mother ship above the one oval they would form.
also this may not make any difference but the clouds in the sky parted away from the area of the ovals.
it couldn't be lights from the ground since they converged so perfectly in many forms and covered vast areas, sometimes a oval light would dissapear and form very close again while going in the motion to form the single oval.

i tried using my phone to take a video but it wasn't able to capture it
the area is populated so there may be other viewers who would of captured it on film or camera.
content.summary: Many unknown lights

content.detailedDescription: Very large delta or triangle craft that flew right over me at about 1000" i did hear the sound of the craft inside my home while i was talking on the phone!!!! when i went outside i saw the craft making a north south flight pattern i did call the new mexico state police to report the sighting as the craft flew over me... i did advise them that it must of been a top secret u.S. air force craft or very very large advance bomber much much larger than a b-52 or b-1 but with a solid delta wing body...
content.summary: Very large triangle craft

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my back pourch looking due east. taveling east to west object appeared a very bright star 20deg above horizon. i ran in the house and grabbed my camera when i was able to get the object in the view finder it was at my 12:00.No noise was heard and the object crossed the eastern sky to 12:00 in about 4sec.I am uploading 3 stills that were captured after reviewing the video. the object appears to be a triangle with a light at each point.The brightest light in the picture was at the rear of the craft. in a somewhat related incident. the next night my wife and myself saw to the east again, around 2200hrs what can only be described as an orange or red glowing orbs in the sky. these lights resembled the pheonix lights. this incident lasted about 15min which i was also able to capture with a hd camera.A total of about six light were captured but only once were to captured at one time about 20deg east both at the same altitude with mabey 1/4 mile between them. the lights moved south to north the appeared to vanish then another would appear in the same place as the first.Again, i was able to capture the event on high def video. i will also share those captures.
content.summary: Starlike object caught with hd sony camera.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 1:45pm est, i was outside doing yard work when i heard what sounded like very low flying helicopters.  it sounded military for sure and when they came over-head, they were so low you could see the missiles on the sides.  they were sikorsky mh-53m pave low military helicopter for sure, but i didn't get any picts.  my son and daughter were out there as well as their two friends and they saw them as well.

this is not a ufo sighting but i found it odd that this type of aircraft was flying over my home when the nearest airfield is about 50-75 miles east of my home.  i wanted to let you know in case of any ufo sightings were in this area during the time i saw the two helicopters.
content.summary: Not a ufo, but black-helicopters (sikorsky mh-53m pave low  military helicopter)

content.detailedDescription: I was on my back patio about 9:30 pm cst.  just as it was getting dark (could only see a couple of stars at the time) i saw a high altitude (approx. 30 k feet) unblinking white light moving from northwest to the south east (more towards the east). i thought this was strange since it did not blink and it was too early to see a satelite.  it flew in a straight line until it eventually was out of sight.  about 10 minutes later, i saw what appeared to be the same light coming back from the direction which the previous light disappeared (same altitude).  the light again was white and unblinking but now moving from the southeast to the northwest.  the light continued to fly to the north of my house and was fliying away from me to the northwest when it started growing brighter.  i suddenly felt very excited.  for about 5-10 seconds it grew bigger and brighter until it suddenly had a bright blue/white flash.  after the blue/white flash it quickly dimmed and disappeared.  even though the object was very high, this bright flash was quite large and bright (about the size of a nickel held at arms length).  since the object was moving away from me i knew it could not be the headlights of an aircraft.  it almost appeared as though the light was a slow rotating light on the object or the object itself was rotating.  about 10 minutes later i then saw what i think was the same unblinking white light object fly at a high altitude back to the southeast again (this time nothing strange happened)...This is very strange because i usually do not see anything but satelites flying above my house and this was too bright to be a satelite.  then, about another 5 minutes later i saw what i think was the same high altitude white unblinking light fly over again.  i did not hear any noises coming from the light on any of these fly overs.  finally, about 15 minutes after my 4th sighting of this object, it flew by again only this time it was very low (approx. 3000-5000 feet) directly over my house.  the light was very white, very bright, and again no blinking and no noise.  i was extremely excited by this and fumbled around and took a picture of it with my phone (you can see the white light on the picture but it just looks like a very bright star on the picture).  if this would have been a helicopter or a plane i surely would have heard something.  this 5th and last sighting of this object lasted about 45 seconds as it slowly flew from the northwest to the sotheast.  i have no idea what this white light was...I really hope someone else saw this and will report it.
content.summary: White unblinking light moves silently back and forth across the sky at different altitudes - one time growing large and then bright blue flash while moving away

content.detailedDescription: Object was hovering above the treeline on between faster rd and 136th and 140th. duration 4 minutes, seen from foster road, walking home. stopped and observed object slowly move left for approx. 30 seconds and hover approx1min, then move rightright, and lost sight of it to treeline. continued walking home. object looking like a great white yellow ball of fire, very bright. reference points: treeline, and two planes that passed behind the object from very far away. very cold fear washed over me when observing object. object was completely silent.
content.summary: Bright flaming hovering object above treeline in southeast portland.

content.detailedDescription:
Around 1145 pm on 18 july 2009 i was on my porch smoking a cigeratte when i was looking to the north/northeast over a bunch of trees ( live right by a culdesac, so not much woods. i saw a craft which i though was a plane moving north by northwest. this craft was just flying in the sky with what i thought were signal lights from a plane. all of a sudden this cfat goes pitch black, then you could almost see an outline of something ( cigar) than it changed it light pattern to where it was green on the bottom, and a redish green on the top. as this is happening a secong craft becomes visable, again with what i thought were lights.. this craft then (2nd craft)shuts down all its lights, then all of a sudden this thing lights up from the bottom with a yellowish white light. it looked like it was not 1 light but 3 or 4 clusters of lights at different segments of the craft. it was in the shape of a triangle. i heard no noise, my dog didn't go nuts. a few minutes later you could hear the faint whisp of helicopter rotors coming from the south.
i served in the army, and i served in iraq. i was stationed at one time or another on the largest air bases in iraq, and i know what the air force navy and marines as well as the army uses for avaition... ( no i don't know about the top secret craft, but again i saw more than the regualr civillian. i just got an erie feeling when i saw this.

more info./.. 

there is a small regional airport 3 miles from where i live but it is mostly cesnas, and there is no real military in the area. closest military post is naval station newport, 35 miles away, otis afb-- cape code ma-- (reserve af base) 30 miles away and handscome afb just north if boston in bedford ma-52 miles away
content.summary: Saw 1 object across sky change colors shape, then 2nd craft appeared

content.detailedDescription: I was driving back home from church.. i was in los angeles convention center and on the exit of the freeway 110 north pico bl..I saw a round ufo.. i saw it cause the lights got my attention.. i worked at the airport so i know how air plains,, and coastguard plains look like..And the lights.. the ufo had yellow light that would go left all in a circle..I recorded it on my cell phone. and i am able to listen to sum unknown voices.. i was alone on the stree.. so thats why i called my friend that lives in huntington park.Cause i knew that he wouldnt belief me, he was able to see it as well his whole family saw it and the as well recorded on a camera..  so if u guys are interested on the video reply or give me a call we can arrange something up... and agree on a fee that its at the right price..
content.summary: It was round yellow lights all over that would turn on and off

content.detailedDescription:
At a family gathering, we where in the porch by the pool, when one of the members call the attention of us by pointing at an object in the sky. we have 4 witnesses. i���m an experience military advisonr and that was���nt a ballon, a blimp or any craft i have ever seen. straight trajectory, and in a milisecond it vanished.  taking pictures with the cellphone proved worthless under the poor light condition.


here in spain was just getting dark outside. sky was clear.


important to mention that in the vecinity (with in 10 miles) of the incident there are 2 space related complexes.

1- madrid deep space communication complex, part of the nasa's deep space network run by the jet propulsion laboratory. 

http://en.Wikipedia.Org/wiki/madrid_deep_space_communication_complex

2- the european space astronomy centre (esac) is esa centre for space science, which means astronomy as well as solar system exploration.

http://www.Esa.Int/specials/esac/semgvhnzcie_0.Html
content.summary: Large sphere, surrounded by orange flashing lights, flying slow and then vanished.

content.detailedDescription: event took place in my hometown of callahan florida, where i have lived since i was about 12 yrs. old. the dates given above are aproximate, but i was around 15 yrs. old at the time of the sighting. we lived on 20 acres of mostly wooded land with neighbors on either side about eighty to one hundred yards away. our house was about thirty yards off the small rural road with the front of the house facing the road. on the other side of the road at the time was just wooded land. ( callahan is a small town with the population at the time of probably a thousand or less ). i'm pretty sure it was the mid 1970's as i was still in jr. hihg school. i was sitting on the couch which was against the wall facing the front of the house watching television which was against the oposite wall with a window about three feet to the right of the t.V., when a bright blue light caught my eye moving left to right outside the window. it took a couple of seconds for me to realise this was not an airplane as i always see the blinking lights of planes comming and going from the jacksonville international airport which was only about twenty miles away. i got up to go outside and get a better look from the front porch and it was vanishing behind the treeline on the other side of the road. it was sort of blimp shaped, with no blinking lights, just a bright glowing blue that seemed to move about the same speed as a cruising airplane. please get back with me soon and let me know if anyone else saw something strange in callahan or jacksonville florida in the mid 70's. this object or phenomenon looked so different from anything i've ever seen, it has stayed with me all these years.
content.summary: Judging distance, at least 80 ft. in length, very bright flourescent blue glow moving slowly, vanishing behind treeline

content.detailedDescription:
At approximately 11:30pm i was driving home and seen what looked like an airplane at a low altitude facing my way. this object had 3 very bright white lights and was shaped as a triangle. when i pulled up to the traffic light ( which was already red) i noticed it wasn't moving..Maybe a helicopter then? only thing was is that it was completely still and there were no blinking lights on it. as i sat and looked at it searching for my phone to snap a picture the two lights on the side turned off and were immediately replaced by two lights going straight down. (almost like a rod) two bright white lights one in the top and one in the middle and one red light at the bottom. the light turned green someone was impatient and started honking their horn and when i looked up again it was gone. 
this happened about 600 yards to the right of the casino, on u.S. 50. the object from a distance appeared to be hovering over the river or the neighborhood just in front of the river. 

we do have an airport (cvg) about 15 miles away,but again this object was completely motionless. also note there are power plants nearby, but there was no blinking lights on this object.
content.summary: Triangle, motionless, instantaneous light formation change

content.detailedDescription: Typo...Bright light over the mountain peak happened last night 7-24-09, accidently clicked "august"
content.summary: Typo...Happened last night, accidently clicked "august"

content.detailedDescription: I was driving west on the way to a friend's house and noticed a beautiful bright light off to the side of the usual light on top of pike peak.  it was a ginormous-looking fireball/light...But moving very slowly.  but as i drove more a couple blocks, it disappeared behind the mountain.  it was amazing and not like anything else i've seen.  i've been looking all over news websites hoping there was some kind of explanation, but i am happy to see someone else had reported this on this website today.
content.summary: Bright light right behind the tip of the mountain

content.detailedDescription: event took place in my hometown of callahan florida, where i have lived since i was about 12 yrs. old. the dates given above are aproximate, but i was around 15 yrs. old at the time of the sighting. we lived on 20 acres of mostly wooded land with neighbors on either side about eighty to one hundred yards away. our house was about thirty yards off the small rural road with the front of the house facing the road. on the other side of the road at the time was just wooded land. ( callahan is a small town with the population at the time of probably a thousand or less ). i'm pretty sure it was the mid 1970's as i was still in jr. hihg school. i was sitting on the couch which was against the wall facing the front of the house watching television which was against the oposite wall with a window about three feet to the right of the t.V., when a bright blue light caught my eye moving left to right outside the window. it took a couple of seconds for me to realise this was not an airplane as i always see the blinking lights of planes comming and going from the jacksonville international airport which was only about twenty miles away. i got up to go outside and get a better look from the front porch and it was vanishing behind the treeline on the other side of the road. it was sort of blimp shaped, with no blinking lights, just a bright glowing blue that seemed to move about the same speed as a cruising airplane. please get back with me soon and let me know if anyone else saw something strange in callahan or jacksonville florida in the mid 70's. this object or phenomenon looked so different from anything i've ever seen, it has stayed with me all these years.
content.summary: Judging distance, at least 80 ft. in length, very bright, flourescent blue glow moving slowly, vanishing behind treeline.

content.detailedDescription:
I had just arrived home after attending the mysteries of the universe conference and listening to stan romanek's talk.  he said that ufos appear wherever he goes, so the entire assembly had gone outside at 9 pm earlier in the evening to look for ufos, but no one saw anything.  so after i got home i was looking in the sky to see if anything would appear and saw nothing for 15 minutes. 

then i got the idea to send a telepathic message out to see if i would get an answer... and immediately upon finishing my sentence a very bright large light blinked on in the nnw sky at approximately 75 degrees up from the horizon.  this was three times the size and brightness of venus.  the object stayed still for about five seconds, then moved north slowly for a short distance and stopped, then blinked out.  i got the feeling that there was a craft there all along and it just put lights on so i could see it and know it was there, and moved so there would be no question that it was answering my message.  

note: we have had a large number of ufo sightings in independence lately.  there is no need to assign this case - i am a field investigator and will close it out myself.
content.summary: Ufo appears in answer to telepathic message

content.detailedDescription:
Ok���at approximately 1 am , i took my dog mishka out to our back court to do the toilet , i stood outside for a while looking up at the night sky  , i had to keep holding my hand up to block out some of the light from our back court lights , but in any case i���m looking up at the sky and deliberately waiting for the ufo���s to show up ���

** i quite literally see ufo���s on an annual basis here in glasgow , always the same kind , small star like objects , flying at various speeds and directions , size and colour can vary , from being a small very dim stars to large bright golden orbs of light , in recent years though they have increased vastly in number and have also started to show up in formation , normally a v shape**

i haven���t seen anything all year , and in the last week or so the weather as been rather bad , the night sky���s have nearly always been overcast , but tonight the sky is clear enough to get a good look at the stars .

so anyway there i am standing there and waiting to see if the ufo will show up ���

i don���t know if this has some significance or importance , but i can sort of feel that they will , its like there���s a sense of expectation in the air , so i continue to stand there and let my eye���s fully adjust to the night sky , i���ve been waiting for about 10 min , when suddenly i seen a very dim star move across the sky , directly above and in front of me , moving from west to east ���

i fully admit i feel a sense of relief when i see it , the idea of it not showing up ���i don���t really know i think it would worry me be it would mean that something has changed ���

in any case i decide to go inside and get my hat ( to help block out the light from the back court and save me from using my hand ) , i come back outside and wait for a further 5 or so minutes , but i don���t see anything , i figure what the hell���i go inside grab my coat , my office chair and a strong pair of binoculars .

i settle down and wait ���

after about 5 min , i see a small star quickly fly ���from what i can see of the middle of the sky , south westerly , heading in the direction of the hill , a few minutes later an almost identical star does the exact same thing  ���i try to view them through the binoculars , but they���re moving far too quickly .

i wait for a little while longer and decide to take my chair and binoculars inside , i go back outside to the back court and have a smoke ���

within minutes , i see four stars flying in ���what i can only call a swirling v formation , and they head in the same direction as the previous two ���i had to laugh because it looked like one of the stars was playing catch up with the others , falling into formation and then lagging behind before trying to catch up again .

i follow their path till they fly behind the rooftops out of sight ���curious as to where they���re all going , i wait a little longer , then see another star like object fly from the south into the north ���jokingly i say to myself ���ok next ��� and then another one shows up right on cue following a similar path as the previous one .( maybe it was the two that where heading south in the direction of the hill i don���t know but these ones looked a little brighter ) , i wait a little longer to see if any more show up and i see another flying from what i can tell quite high in the sky ..Moving in a sort of north-easterly direction ���

at this i go back inside at around 1:30 am  , though i���m absolutely sure if i stayed out any longer i���d see more and i���m even toying with the idea of going back outside .


 now i don���t know what these are ..But they certainly don���t seem like any ufo i���ve ever hard anybody else describe , i���m trying desperately to find a way of describing how they move ���

they move in a very quick but very graceful fashion , almost like how an insect fly���s through the air , as for size , well as i���m sure you can guess , judging a small fast moving point of light in the sky is very difficult .

height���at my best guess , 20 /30 feet above the electricity pylons , maybe more , at times i get the impression that they aren���t very big  , maybe a few feet across at best the size of a small car seen at a distance .

i know my eye���s aren���t playing tricks on me and i���m not mistakenly picking out insects that get caught reflecting light , best way i can describe is to say that they are balls of light , flying at a distance , but like i say it almost impossible for me to really judge their size and distance .

so all in tonight in the space of half an hour ���maybe a little more , i���ve seen no less than 10 ufo���s , buzzing about the sky ���


1 ) i live in a two story building , i live on the ground floor , we have a large back court area that faces a large wood directly north of my building , some open ground before you reach the trees , holds power pylons that branch off east and west and a power substation , i was standing in the back court with my dog , looking up at the night sky .

2 ) to cut a long story short its something i���ve known about for a very long time , i���ve become very accustomed to seeing these ���what i can only describe as flying stars .

3 ) well as i say , i���ve known about them for a great many years , i don���t know what they are , but over the years i���ve ruled out everything , they don���t fly like any conventional aircraft as they seem to move in an almost fluid and organic fashion , i know they are intelligent due to past experience , at one point one of them made a point of grabbing myself and two friends attention by flashing / blinking  at us , only until we where all giving it our full attention , did it make a point of flying away , at first slowly and then at impossible speeds .

4 ) on this sighting they where all flying in different directions through the sky , the formation of four looked as though it was a swirling / rotating v formation ���with a single one , flying into , and then lagging out of the formation , i���ve noticed in recent years they have started to move in a very fluid like way , its hard to explain , but if they happen to be lower than normal ( normal being very high up ) , they almost wobble when they move ���the best way i can describe it is to say they fly much like a housefly or insect would  .

5 ) well i have become very accustomed to them , i know this is gonna sound completely unbelievable , but if you���ve seen these things as much as i have , you become used to them , though i will say there was a sense of anticipation in the air , it was like i could feel that they where going to make an appearance .

6 ) the simply fly out of sight , or so far away that i can no longer see them .
content.summary: Numerous star like objects , some in formation .

content.detailedDescription:
Cyprus ufo sighting details 
date:  23 july 2009
time:  20:55
where:  coral bay, near paphos, cyprus (eastern mediterranean)
clear night sky, light onshore breeze, about 30 c, high humidity

my wife and i were sitting on our terrace overlooking the sea, enjoying the sunset, followed by the crescent moon setting in coral bay, on the western coast of cyprus.  in the darkened skies, as we looked out to sea, an unknown object flying in a north-south direction crossed the sky in front of us.  it was very, very bright. altitude was about 300 feet, speed about 200 mph or less.  the unknown object appeared like a fireball, extremely bright red-orange in colour, maintained the same altitude an speed as it passed to the south in the direction of paphos.  maintained a level flight all the time it was in sight.  slow & steady.
no audible sound or visible shape other than a ball-like appearance. it was a spectacular sighting - very bright.  we knew immediately that it was a ufo.  there are often planes sighted in this area of the sky, as it is en route to nearby paphos international airport (pfo), but this was so different, this was easily ruled out as no plane on approach to landing ever looked like this!

sighting corroborated by neighbours who telephoned shortly afterwards to ask if we had seen it.  shortly after the sighting, we noted the time and full details.
no photos. number of witnesses known at time of this report:  6
(i am a mufon member)
below is article in cyprus mail today, 25 july 2009.  as a result of this newspaper article, so far we have been in contact with 2 other people who witnessed this event, in nearby villages closer to paphos, plus 2 who saw something they were sure was similar in pegeia (same area) about one month ago, about same time of evening.

http://www.Cyprus-mail.Com/news/main.Php?Id=46988&cat_id=1

strange sighting of ufo near paphos 
by nathan morley, 25 july 2009
copyright ��� cyprus mail 2009  

four residents spotted a strange light zipping across the coast off paphos on thursday night in the latest in a series of incidents of unidentified objects in our skies.

the ufo was clearly seen by john knowles, a research specialist with mutual ufo network, he told the cyprus mail the sighting took place near coral bay and is appealing for more witnesses.

it was heading towards paphos just off the coast, slow moving and a very bright fireball, so there may very well have been other witnesses.���

���we had been watching the crescent moon set in coral bay. in the darkened skies, as we looked out to sea, an unknown object flying in a north-south direction crossed the sky in front of us. altitude was about 300 feet, speed about 200 mph or less. 

���the object that appeared like a fireball, extremely bright red-orange in colour, it maintained the same altitude as it passed to the south in the direction of paphos.���

knowles added the object, which he saw at around 20.55pm on thursday, finally vanished from the sky without trace.

his account was backed up by his next door neighbours, who also witnessed the bizarre sight and rushed to the phone to alert him.

annie davidson of tala said: ���i was out walking my dog and i saw a brilliant ball of light travelling very slowly close to the coastline. it was clearly visible for a while and then disappeared. i have never seen anything like it before.��� 

on monday, several sightings of five bright red lights hovering in the night sky near cape greco were observed. according to witness accounts, the lights moved creating several different shapes for around 8 minutes before disappearing. 

some suggest that chinese lanterns could to be the most likely culprit, as they are often released into the skies at weddings and parties.

recently cyprus has been flooded with ufo reports from all parts of the island; last month a pilot approaching the illegal tymbou airport in the north reported being followed by what he described as a ���bright object which resembled a big man or a big garbage bag���.

the ufo followed the aircraft until it landed and then disappeared.
content.summary: Fireball-type sighting, eastern mediterranean island of cyprus, very bright orange-red, about 300 feet altitude, slow and steady, about 200 mph.  at least 6 witnesses known.

content.detailedDescription:
Last night we were at a star party (put on by a local amateur astronomy club).  

at 10:11pm the iss flew over.  there was a dim light a couple of degrees behind the iss.  it was following the same orbit as the iss.

i assumed it was the shuttle but learned today that it is still docked.

there is a russian supply craft that launched yesterday but it isn't scheduled to dock with the iss until wednesday (29 jul), so i don't see how it would have been so close to the iss already.

that being said, in all likely-hood it was the russian craft, but in case it can be proved that the supply craft wasn't that close to the iss at that time, then i want to have it documented that an entire field of amateur astronomers near pittsburgh saw "something".  i am one of those.
content.summary: Viewing iss pass @ a star party last night and saw an object trailing it.

content.detailedDescription: Accommodation within 5 minutes, move to an altitude of about 1000 meters, changing the form. moving silently. i enclose a reconstruction of the object.
content.summary: A brilliant, round object that changes shape.

content.detailedDescription:
I was taking random photos with nikon s630 camera and took 14-15 photos of an intersection in superior colorado. one photo shows two objects and the next photo taken four (4) seconds later the two objects are not in the photo. 
note: i cannot or did not see these two objects. i was looking in the direction of where the camera was pointing and did not notice them in the sky.
i take random photos hoping something unusual will show up. i take approximately 7000 photos a week, and i can guarantee anyone taking the amount of photos i take will get photos of ufos. 
this is the second time this week i got photos of unknown objects. on tuesday july 14, 2009 i took a photo of a ufo and it is also submitted to mufon. i was also sitting an another intersection in boulder county colorado waiting for the light to change. 

i simply have the moon roof open and hold my arm out and take photos. over and over, as many as i can before the light changes. of course if one is worried what people in other cars will think then don't do it. i get lots of looks, even from police officers. it is not illegal to take photographs, and remember; photograph everything and anything.

our alien visitors are out there and exist mainly in the ir spectrum which the human (most humans that is) eye cannot see. but digital cameras and video recorders can see ir and this is the secret.
content.summary: Two objects appear in photo, then four seconds later in next photo do not appear

content.detailedDescription:
A large number of people watching the space station on the evening of 2009.07.24 in ohio saw something fly by it. a lot of phone calls reported it.

it was thought the object was in space, rather than a plane.

will send more information
content.summary: A large number of people watching the space station saw something fly by it, it was in space
